member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.GrayscaleEffect
member.summary: Converts an image to monochromatic gray.

remarks.p: Effect inputs and outputs are assumed to be in premultiplied alpha format, but this effect operates internally on straight alpha data, so its input values will be unpremultiplied, then the grayscale conversion applied, and finally the result converted back to premultiplied format.
